text: James Robert "Bob" Belden (October 31, 1956 â€“ May 20, 2015) was an American saxophonist, arranger, composer, bandleader and producer.Bob Belden at All About Jazz He may be best known for his Grammy Award winning jazz orchestral recording, "The Black Dahlia".Bob Belden profile , BlueNote.com; accessed May 20, 2015. Belden was born in Evanston, Illinois. Belden died of a heart attack on May 20, 2015, at Lenox Hill Hospital in Manhattan, aged 58. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American composers Category:American saxophonists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Musicians from Illinois
title: Bob Belden
